original_text: And when Samuel had caused all the tribes of Israel to come near, the tribe of Benjamin was taken.
korean_text: 사무엘이 이에 이스라엘 모든 지파를 가까이 오게 하였더니 베냐민 지파가 뽑혔고

sentences.original_text: And when Samuel had caused all the tribes of Israel to come near,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 사무엘이 이스라엘의 모든 지파를 가까이 오게 했을 때,

sentences.original_text: the tribe of Benjamin was taken.
